author: Sean Koerner
comment: Disingenuous price listing, hiding additional fees during the booking process.

author: Iris DeSalvo Morris
comment: I just looked at it, I didn't get a chance to use it yet, although what I did see, I didn't see too many rooms available.

author: nijel robinson
comment: Great perks, great deals, the customer service is on point and always available. I love this application .

author: trinity bell
comment: Non refundable policy
Love it always great deals!!!

author: Shimana Wallace
comment: Alsome

author: Destiny Montgomery
comment: Nice app

author: Angel Ogamba
comment: This app was complete BS. There is no cancellation and even if they make an exception for you they credit your hotel tonight account instead of refunding your payment method. You can't even pick which room you need in advance, they let the hotel choose the room type for you. They basically trap people into downloading and using their app which is complete fraud. I will NEVER use this app again and I encourage you all to do the same!!!

author: Alex Thorn
comment: First of all the hotels they have deals with are still overpriced. I booked a hotel on the fly, because the commute home would be far too long. Got to the hotel and they said I couldn't check in because it was past midnight. The hotel was very nice and refunded the money back to hotel tonight. Then hotel tonight wouldn't refund my money back to bank. Saying it would stay as a credit towards my next hotel booking. Why would I use an app called hotel tonight... When I tried to book a hotel... Tonight... And couldn't get a room! It's ridiculous. Still trying to get my money back I to my bank account because I will never book with this app again!

author: honesty corner
comment: It used to have great prices until they allowed it to go past one week booking. Now it works different and it doesnt have the same discounts. Too bad because I used to use it regularly.

author: Richard Webb
comment: Unreliable. Arrived at Baymont Inn Sarasota Feb 17 and was told reservation made Feb 15 did not exist. I showed receipt on my phone. Was not offered equivalent room, only a $50 credit by HT. Nothing available even in nearby cities for less than $250. Had to drive home 2.5 hours, 172 miles. Entire 3-day weekend ruined.  Hotels do not respect HT prepaid reservations. You might get stranded like I did.

author: Imre
comment: Is this a joke? I would rate -5 stars if I could for not having any filters or sort options such as by price even???

author: Kay Lenhart
comment: Even after un-installing, it still takes my phone hostage via popup ads that cover the entire screen weeks after! Re-installed so I could leave this review / warning.

author: Michael G
comment: Garbage app with tricky coupon codes that are just to lure you to install.

author: Kate Mortensen
comment: Deals are not great and experienced a problem and delay while checking in at my first booking.

author: Katie Steck
comment: Cool app with great customer service! Super easy to navigate and really handy in a pinch (which is like the story of my life).

author: Richard Hebben
comment: I love this app,  we have found some great places to stay and I find the "Why we love it reviews" to be very informative.

author: Laura Gearhart
comment: Love love love. Discovering hotels I never knew we had on this island
Very cool easy to use app huge discounts at solid hotels

author: Joseph Rivera
comment: It's aight. The resort fees are what "get ya" in the end.
Great app. Have used it with success on numerous occasions. Easy to use.
Great way to get cheap rooms with the click of a thingy. Makes you look like a boss. Like me.
Great app for booking rooms

author: Omer Khan
comment: best app fo booking room in hotel

author: Jasmin Raveneau
comment: I like the deals and options this appl gives

author: Matthew St. Amour
comment: Always the best deals.  Wonderful support
Easy to use app and good last minute deals. Saved us a ton of money.

author: Jose Angelo Perez
comment: The best very clean low-key handle your business.

author: Sherline Moise
comment: User friendly. Convenient. Great prices. This is my new favorite app!

author: Kelley Reynolds
comment: Easy and convenient to use.  Competitive prices

author: Maggie Larocque
comment: Fantastic!!  Simple,  informative,  fast!

author: Ed Pim
comment: Great reviews and easy to use.

author: Brian Gaul
comment: Great app
Best deals!

author: Vanessa Philippe-Auguste
comment: Great deals

author: JENNIFER Lindsey
comment: App is great

author: Amy P
comment: This app is extremely misleading. They put prices for hotel rooms and steep discounts so you think you're getting a great deal, but when you show up at the hotel they're not giving you the room you thought you were paying for. I attempted to reach out to customer service for assistance with this issue, but they refused to do anything and blamed the hotel for giving us a room valued at half of what we thought we paid for. I will never use this app again.

author: Stephanie Cummings
comment: I have used this app several times and love it!! I've driven across country multiple times and would book the hotel room about an hour before i knew we would be ready to stop driving. I was never disappointed with the rooms we were able to get and definitely appreciated the pricing. It's just such an easy and convenient app!!

author: julio herrera
comment: The worssssssssssttt app ever the support it is so bad we trying to reserve an hotel to Santa Catalina Island we pay almost $400 and they give us an Hotel on long beach so we try to change the hotel on Catalina island they didn't help us

author: Susan
comment: Update: Still love this app overall, but not as reliable about last year. Used to let me book a room tonight after midnight local time wherever I am. All but 1 of the rooms I've booked have been as expected without having to use multiple apps. That 1 time, the hotel had been shut down for a while. The hotel always has the info, whether I booked it in the parking lot or days ago. By using the map, I can find something close to my destination in larger cities. Used to work great, very sporadic and hard to search rural areas
